 heinzkat  (2202) on 19-Feb-08:
I think you somehow missed 7. ... Qxe4  with AT LEAST a perpetual check for Black already. Maybe even more... via 8. Kd1 Qxc2  9. Ke1 Qe4  it's a draw; via 9. Ke1 Qxc1  10. Qd1 Nc2  Black should be winning.
